homepage.title: Junior Software Engineer
homepage.intro: I am Julien Barrea, a passionate software developer with a huge eager for creating innovative solutions and discovering new languages and technologies. Explore my projects and feel free to reach out!

projects.title: Notable Projects
projects.project1: A personal website to showcase my projects and skills, built with Angular and Bootstrap, featuring a responsive design and multi-language support;
projects.project2: Domain name management (websites, emails, private DNS);
projects.project3: Hosting websites on Lubuntu / Synology servers;
projects.project4: Various command line games (Hangman, Mastermind, Card games, ...);
projects.project5: Simple applications with graphical interfaces in C++ and C# (calculator, salary calculation, ...);
projects.project6: Minesweeper game in JavaFX with cross-platform installers;
projects.project7: Planning management web app powered by Java Spring MVC.
